name: sharepage
description: GitHub Pages based Obsidian document renderer

scripts.build:css: cat css/vars.css css/vars-tokens.css css/base.css css/layout.css css/components.css css/content.css css/markdown-features.css css/toc.css css/responsive.css css/image-viewer.css css/code-utils.css css/callouts.css css/animations.css css/custom.css > css/bundle.css
scripts.deploy: npm run sync && git add . && git commit -m 'chore: deploy updates' && git pull origin main --no-rebase -X ours && git push origin main
